item.description:
Join Jen Hammel - Team Leader of Lynda's Ladies at The Lansdowne Pub on Sunday, July 25th from 6-9pm for the 3rd Annual Booze for Boobies!

There will be two options for admission at the door:
General Admission is $15 and includes 1 free raffle ticket
VIP Admission is $25 and includes a private bar area, free appetizers, and 2 free raffle tickets.

**Special note** If you are a 2010 Boston 3-Day walker and you come to this event, bring your walker ID and receive an upgrade from General Admission to VIP admission!

Additional raffle tickets may be purchased:
1 for $5
3 for $10
10 for $20

In previous years prizes for Booze for Boobies have totaled around $3,500, but this year Booze for Boobies is BIGGER and better than ever before! Over $8,800 in prizes, a live performance by the B-Suite Band (http://bsuitemusic.co..., and a special performance by The Boston Babydolls!

Money raised during this fundraiser will benefit the Susan G. Komen and the National Philanthropic Trust Breast Cancer Fund via Jen Hammel's 3-Day Walk for breast cancer in San Diego - Nov 19-21st

In ABC order, here are the raffle prize sponsors:

21st Amendment
28 Degrees
Ames Hotel
Amrhein's
Aquatine Dedham

OM

Union Bar & Grill
Upstairs on the Square
Urban AdvenTours

Looking forward to seeing you there!

If you can't attend the event but want to donate and help the cause, go to my fundraising web page: http://bit.ly/jh2010...
item.name: 3rd Annual Booze for Boobies
